QuestData.Title: Restoring Sanctity
QuestData.Description: Not long ago, the once tranquil owlkin of the region appeared on the shores of this island. One by one they would come to steal the bones of the fallen dragons. I do not know what would cause these creatures such distress or why they would want the bones of the deceased, but the spirits of the brood have grown restless due to this sacrilege.$B$BTo the west, across the Crimson Reach, you will find Ragefeather Ridge. Venture to the owlkin encampments and recover the pilfered dragon bones.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prince Toreth on Wyrmscar Island wants you to recover 8 Dragon Bones.
QuestData.CompletionText: The dragon wars have long since passed. All that remains are bones and the agitated remnants of Ysera's brood.
QuestData.RewardText: A ritual? The owlkin had lived in harmony with the land for thousands of years. Such a thing is an aberration!$B$BSuch a pity...
